1110111010100111 1101001001010000 1 -> sum: 1100000011111000, cout: 1
0010010000001111 0001001010000100 0 -> sum: 0011011010010011, cout: 0
0110101010100101 0010001011001010 1 -> sum: 1000110101110000, cout: 0
1101100100101010 1011010011101010 0 -> sum: 1000111000010100, cout: 1
1100011100110000 1111001000000001 1 -> sum: 1011100100110010, cout: 1
